Html:
Hello,

i'm trying to implement CustomCommands on control behaviours and i saw a couple of implementations like 

http://www.85turns.com/2009/06/24/togglebutton-command-for-prism/

http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman/2009/08/13/c-code-snippet-to-create-commands-with-attached-behaviors-using-prism/#comment-1134

However, i cannot seem to find CommandBehaviorBase<T> class on the CAL assemblies of the 10th code drop. 

Does it exist on a beta release, which i'm not aware of ? Can anybody share some enlightment ?

Regards,

Francisco

Hi Francisco,

The Composite Application Guidance for WPF & Silverilght has an official release. You can download it from here. With that release of the guidance comes a version of the CAL that contains the CommandBehaviorBase<T> class. If you open the solution that contains the library (CompositeApplicationLibrary.sln), you should be able to find it in the Composite.Presentation.Silverlight project inside the Command folder.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
